page.title: 04RECREATION IN LYNSTED
page.content: There are very few facilities for playing sports or following a hobby in the Lynsted area. There are no playgrounds, no tennis courts, no parks, no sports areas. I found that the most popular pastime in Lynsted is watching T.V. The children I asked watch television for two to five hours a day. The popular games are playing rounders & cricket, tennis, running & swimming in summer. In the playground most people like playing "Filmstars" & "Squareball". On T.V. the most popular programmes are Soap Operas. For music the children like "Wham" & the older people like Rock & Roll or Classical like Bing Crosby. People try to play sports in their garden if it is big enough. Some children play in the fields because there are no proper sports places. You have to invent your own games.
